<a id="World2D"></a>

# World2D

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A resource that holds all components of a 2D world, such as a canvas and a physics space.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Class that has everything pertaining to a 2D world: A physics space, a canvas, and a sound space. 2D nodes register their resources into the current 2D world.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Ray-casting](../tutorials/physics/ray-casting.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="World2D_property_canvas"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[RID](RID.md) **canvas** [ðŸ”—](#World2D_property_canvas)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [RID](RID.md) **get_canvas**\ (\ )

The [RID](RID.md) of this world's canvas resource. Used by the [RenderingServer](RenderingServer.md) for 2D drawing.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="World2D_property_direct_space_state"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PhysicsDirectSpaceState2D](PhysicsDirectSpaceState2D.md) **direct_space_state** [ðŸ”—](#World2D_property_direct_space_state)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [PhysicsDirectSpaceState2D](PhysicsDirectSpaceState2D.md) **get_direct_space_state**\ (\ )

Direct access to the world's physics 2D space state. Used for querying current and potential collisions. When using multi-threaded physics, access is limited to [Node._physics_process()](Node.md#Node_private_method__physics_process) in the main thread.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="World2D_property_navigation_map"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[RID](RID.md) **navigation_map** [ðŸ”—](#World2D_property_navigation_map)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [RID](RID.md) **get_navigation_map**\ (\ )

The [RID](RID.md) of this world's navigation map. Used by the [NavigationServer2D](NavigationServer2D.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="World2D_property_space"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[RID](RID.md) **space** [ðŸ”—](#World2D_property_space)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [RID](RID.md) **get_space**\ (\ )

The [RID](RID.md) of this world's physics space resource. Used by the [PhysicsServer2D](PhysicsServer2D.md) for 2D physics, treating it as both a space and an area.
